original_title: Bang bang je t'aime je t'aime
overview: "She" drives a cab, see it is the car that leads her, at the thread of chance, because "she" is on the razor's edge. "She" is not desperate but desperate, however life takes care of finding a meaning for her. The other waits, but masters, her desires, her destiny, her night.
title: Bang bang je t'aime je t'aime
